win_condition: 0) You win when only Unaligned players; and players of the Townsfolk Team remain.

abilities.details: If the %n becomes Mayor; their vote is counted as 3.
If the %n becomes Mayor; their vote is counted as -2.
If the %n becomes Mayor; their vote is counted as -3.
If the %n becomes Mayor; their vote is counted as -4.
All attempts to do will result in failure.

abilities.basics: *Start:* Receives a list of three players. At least one of those players is part of the townsfolk team.
*Passive* Redirect one action targetted at you to a target of your choosing. Does not affect attacks. (once)
abilities.details: Can update target once per phase, with one emergency change,

abilities.basics: *Passive* Redirect one action targetted at you to a target of your choosing. This includes attacks. (twice)
abilities.details: Can update target once per phase, with one emergency change,

abilities.basics: *Passive:* Turn into first TI that dies
abilities.details: At the start of the first day where a town investigative role died the previous day or night; or lost their role; the %n will become the role of the first town investigative role that died, or lost their role.
The %n will be told the role of one random person from the Townsfolk team at the start of the game.

abilities.basics: *Passive:* Start with 2 votes on public polls
*Passive:* You are informed when an ability is used on you but not which.
*Passive:* Gain access to an additional reporter channel.
*On Lynch:* Attack target if they voted for you
abilities.details: If the %n is lynched by unusual means the player responsible for this will die with the %n.
When the %n dies in any way other than by directly being lynched; the target will die along with the %n.
When the %n dies in any way other than by directly being lynched; the targets will die along with the %n.

abilities.basics: *On Death:* Give journal to targetted role
abilities.details: The %n selects a role by saying the noun of a role name.

abilities.basics: *On Death:* Know attacker. Survive until night starts.
abilities.details: If the %n is killed by the lynch; they will die as normal.

abilities.basics: *On Death:* Turn into a different random townsfolk role
abilities.details: If the %n is killed by the lynch; they will die as normal.
%n is informed if they were attacked. If a %n evades an attack; the attackers are told why.
%n is informed if they were attacked. If a %n evades an attack; the attackers are told why.
%n is informed if they were attacked. If a %n evades an attack; the attackers are told why.

abilities.basics: *End Night:* Use holy water on player
abilities.details: If that player is werewolf/solo, that player will die. Otherwise, the %n dies.

abilities.basics: *End Night:* Use holy water on two players
abilities.details: If that player is werewolf/solo, that player will die. Otherwise, the %n dies.

abilities.basics: *End Night:* Protect three players from any attack for one night (once) and attack one player (once).
*End Night:* Protect a player from the next lynch
abilities.details: The %n can not protect the same player; from the lynch; two times in a row.

abilities.basics: *End Night:* Can add an extra lynch poll tomorrow. (once)
*Night Immediate:* Check player for threat (aura teller)
*Night Immediate:* Check two players for threat (aura teller)
*Night Start Passive:* Learn the causes of death of recently deceased players.
abilities.details: The %n will be told how that specific player died; if multiple causes of death were present; then all causes will be revealed to the %n.
Each correct guess is confirmed. Tanner and Flute Player influences are applied. You may guess abilities (like Runner), partial roles (like Lone or Firebird) or full roles (like Lone Firebird).
Each correct guess is confirmed. Tanner and Flute Player influences are applied. You may guess abilities (like Runner), partial roles (like Lone or Firebird) or full roles (like Lone Firebird).
Each correct guess is confirmed. Tanner and Flute Player influences are applied. You may guess abilities (like Runner), partial roles (like Lone or Firebird) or full roles (like Lone Firebird).
Each correct guess is confirmed. Tanner and Flute Player influences are applied. You may guess abilities (like Runner), partial roles (like Lone or Firebird) or full roles (like Lone Firebird).

abilities.basics: *Night Immediate:* Grandma up to two players
*Night Immediate:* Grandma up to one player
*Night Immediate:* Check if one players is in wolfpack

abilities.details: Each night; the %n may check any noun or adjective to determine the number of players currently alive with that word in their role.
Each night; the %n may threaten a player. The morning after; that player has 2 more invisible votes against them on the daily death poll.
Each night; the %n may threaten two players. The morning after; these players have 2 more invisible votes against them on the daily death poll.
Each night; the %n may threaten a player. The morning after; that player has 3 more invisible votes against them on the daily death poll.

abilities.basics: *Night Immediate:* Protect three players from any kill for one night (once)

abilities.details: Canceling the lynch is an immediate effect. However; the fact that the lynch has been canceled will only be revealed at the end of the day.

abilities.basics: *End Day:* Protect one player from death for one night
abilities.details: The %n can not protect the same player two times in a row.
The %n chooses if they want to reveal themselves for their day kill.

abilities.basics:
*Immediate Day:* Amuler Holder
 *Any Time:* Shatter amulet
*Immediate Day:* Choose two targets. For the rest of the day and following night, actions and kills directed towards a target will instead hit your other target

abilities.details: The %n chooses if they want to reveal themselves for their day kill.
The %n’s target may choose one of their day/night abilities to do twice.

abilities.basics: *End Day:* Send out a fake devil’s wager
abilities.details: The devil’s wager doesn’t actually work and will silently fail. Investigations will show a role you choose.

abilities.basics: *Passive:* Start with -2 votes on public polls
abilities.win: You additionally also win if you are lynched.

abilities.basics: *Passive:* Start with -2 votes on public polls
abilities.win: You additionally also win if you become Mayor.

abilities.basics: *Passive:* Start with 4 votes on public polls
abilities.win: You additionally also win if you do not gain any elected roles. Elected roles you gain while being lynched count.
You additionally also win if the player above you in the list wins. If their win condition requires them to kill you; their team can still win even if you are alive.
You additionally also win if the player below you in the list wins. If their win condition requires them to kill you; their team can still win even if you are alive.

abilities.details: The Cult can attack until the last Cult Leader dies.
The Cult can attack until the last Cult Leader dies.
The Cult can attack until the last Cult Leader dies.
It is possible that a Mad Scientist doesn't exist.
